title: One essence away
body: Riot, I am one single speck of orange essence away from getting the skin I want, do you think you could give me that one piece of orange essence, because I just grinded out a game for a key fragment to get a key unlock the chest and get any skin in the entire game, but I got a ward skin. A ward skin that was 213 orange essence, and I needed 214. I am really salty about not getting Project {{champion:238}} that much earlier than I wanted. Granted I recently got Championship {{champion:238}}  but I wanted to get Project Zed as well. Thank you for listening to my request.

replies.body:
I'm sorry, but we're not able to gift you any type of essence. {{item:3070}} 

Let me know if you have any other questions.
